questions.question: Workplace (Health, Safety and Welfare) Regulations 1992 will cover which 2 issues?

choices.answer: Having somewhere to rest , eat and have drinking water
Having the correct PPE to wear
Ventilation, temperature and lighting within your work area
A fully stocked first aid box

questions.question: Provision and Use of Work Equipment Regulations 1998 Relates to which  2  issues?

choices.answer: Equipment must be suitable and fit for purpose
You must ensure that you lift equipment correctly
All equipment must be PAT tested
Regular maintenance and monitoring of work equipment

questions.question: PPE at work Regulations1992 relates to which 2 issues?

choices.answer: Not wearing the correct PPE can lead to Dermatitis
Your employer must provide suitable PPE
You only wear PPE if it matches your outfit
You wont need PPE when rinsing colours as hands will be wet

questions.question: COSHH Regulations 2003 relates to which issues?

choices.answer: How to store and handle hazardous substances
How to use and dispose of hazardous substances
How to display the products
How to report products that do not work as stated

questions.question: Electricity at Work Regulations 1989 require you to:

choices.answer: Buy new equipment every year
Have electrical equipment PAT tested every year
To use electrical equipment until it burns out
To remove faulty equipment and label it

questions.question: RIDDOR 1995 states that you must report the following:

choices.answer: Death
More than 3 days off ill
Major injuries sustained at work
A snowboarding accident whilst on holiday

questions.question: Cosmetic Products (safety) Regulations 2008 relate to which issue?

choices.answer: The colour of the packaging for products
The strength of chemicals used within the products
The use by date of the product
The price you can sell products for

questions.question: Health and Safety Regulations 1981 states that: choose 2

choices.answer: an appointed person should take charge of first aid
You must have pain relief available in your first aid box
Your first aid box must be suitably stocked
You must go home if you cut your fingers whilst cutting hair

questions.question: The Manual Handling Operations Regulations 1992 address the following, choose 2:

choices.answer: Any risk of injury involved in manual movement
Ensuring all stock is put away immediately after delivery
Your individual capabilities of manual moving
Ensuring that boxes are stacked up tall out of the way
